system.requirements:
Tier 2; BS 40, Implanted Potentia Coil or Mechanicus Implants.

system.effect: When Character succeeds on a Ballistic Skill Test with an Integrated Weapon, they can choose to gain 1 Fatigue, in so doing they score an additional Two Degrees of Success on that test.
